title: What is bipolar disorder?
description: The word bipolar means 'two extremes.' For the many millions experiencing bipolar disorder around the world, life is split between two different realities: elation and depression. So what causes this disorder? And can it be treated? Helen M. Farrell describes the root causes and treatments for bipolar disorder.
author: Helen M. Farrell
keywords: TED, talks, TED-Ed, mental health, medical research, brain, depression
